heading: HB09100
0: AN ACT PROHIBITING THE CONSTRUCTION OF MALLS, SPORTS CENTERS, CONVENTION CENTERS, EXHIBITION CENTERS AND SIMILAR ESTABLISHMENTS WITHIN A THREE-KILOMETER RADIUS FROM THE EXIT AND ENTRANCE OF AN EXPRESSWAY TO PREVENT TRAFFIC CONGESTION THEREIN AND PROVIDING PENALTIES THEREFOR
